title: Chainlink External Adapter for AlphaVantage
description:
Use this adapter for connecting to [AlphaVantage's API](https://www.alphavantage.co/documentation/) from a Chainlink node.
##### NOTE: the `price` endpoint is temporarily still supported, however, is being deprecated. Please use the `forex` endpoint instead.

API_KEY.description: An API key that can be obtained from [here](https://www.alphavantage.co/support/#api-key)
